data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Khon Kaen who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khon Kaen, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Khon Kaen.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Khon Kaen, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,783,980 who are far from you in Khon Kaen, Thailand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Nyahkur people. Make the Nyahkur people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Khon Kaen prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Khon Kaen, Thailand to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khon Kaen, Thailand has a population of 1,807,600.

We estimate Khon Kaen has 11,688 people who might know Jesus, 11,932 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,783,980 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Khon Kaen, Thailand humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
